closed_reason: Verified environment health: go build ./... and go test ./... both pass. All 7 test packages pass. Environment ready for implementation.
description:
Before any code changes, verify the project is in a healthy state:
1. Run go build ./...
2. Run go test ./...
3. Verify all tests pass

BLOCKING: Do not proceed if tests fail.

title: Run existing tests and validate environment
